summary: THE REAR-VIEW MIRRORS DID NOT WORK PROPERLY.  EVERY TIME YOU START THE CAR THE MIRRORS RESET TO A POSITION THAT MAKES IT IMPOSSIBLE TO SEE BEHIND YOU.  YOU MUST MANUALLY CHANGE THE MIRRORS EACH TIME YOU RESTART THE CAR.  THE MIRRORS ARE SUPPOSED TO REMEMBER THE PROPER SETTING FOR TWO DRIVERS. THIS IS A MAJOR SAFETY HAZARD.  DEALER HAS BEEN UNABLE TO FIX THIS PROBLEM.        *TT
